array.string:
A CAMAC crate is showing no power or can not be reached.
Possible reasons: 1) No power. 2) Either: a)No PCI-CAMAC card installed in the Mac or.. b)if using USB, cable is disconnected or USB device not selected in the Controller dialog or.. c)the configuration connections between the crate and the mac may not be correct. 3) Driver not installed. (Should also be a 'No Driver' alarm posted) 4) A bad cable.
This alarm will go away when the crate can be reached.
Acknowledging this alarm will silence it.
